website_summaries.verdict: Includes a few USB ports along with all kinds of other connection options to provide great versatility.
pros: Perfect option for those who need a few USB ports, but also need an HDMI port and an SD memory card slot
Has specialized ports to provide power for charging of multiple devices
Works best with Mac, but will run from many Windows computers, too
cons: Overkill for someone who just needs USB ports and nothing else

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Update: The company promptly reached out to me and offered a replacement. Great customer service! I tried out the replacement that they sent me and all ports are working including the SD card reader. Update 9/10/17: - I just tried to use the Card reader, it does not work. I'm hoping the company will comment and reply on this. Otherwise, all the ports work except for the card reader. Prior Review: Love this thing. It works exactly as advertised. I'm currently powering my macbook pro by plugging in my power brick into the usb c port on this adapter, then the adapter into my computer.
customer_reviews.author: prchord

customer_reviews.title: Flaky, hot, and unusable.
customer_reviews.text: Flaky. Could not handle our USB Fujitsu scanner and/or Logitech unifying receiver. The scanner did not work at all, even after reinstalling the software. The keyboard & mouse became nearly useless with many motions and key entries being ignored completely. Instructions are almost none, and mostly in Chinese. It also runs hot. I am going back to my J5 Create device even though it does not have the memory card slot which prompted me to buy this Letscom. I am returning it to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Interferes with WIFI
customer_reviews.text: I used the HDMI adapter on this unit to connect to a monitor and the unit interferes with the wifi on a brand new macbook to the point where it's useless. Real bummer, considering this thing was fifty bucks. Look elsewhere, or keep the packaging so you can return it, unlike this idiot (me).
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Schlechter

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a device that removes one usb-c port from your Mac.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to work well for a little while, but now the hdmi connection only works on occasion. It also gets very hot when connected to power. The nail in the coffin for this was last night when my Mac suddenly stopped connecting to any WiFi networks. After troubleshooting, I finally just unplugged the dongle and everything started working again. How? Don’t know. But with this thing plugged in, no wifi connections would work.
customer_reviews.author: JJD

customer_reviews.title: Not stable, connection is lost with a simple tap or bump.
customer_reviews.text: If you move this, even slightly, the connection is lost. Super frustrating to have your data transfer disrupted at the slightest nudge. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Only problem is the heat
customer_reviews.text: So far no major problems. It heats up a lot while in use which is why I put 4 stars. I saw a lot of reviews about lost wifi during use, but I haven't had any problem using the internet while using the product. It's very useful when I need it, but most of the time I only use the HDMI part for an external monitor and one USB port for an external drive. But it has also worked just fine while using another USB port for a number pad or an iPhone. All in all a great product. Looks nice too. I would definitely buy it again if I lost the first.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Stone

customer_reviews.title: i plugged into a 4k tv but the adapter only ...
customer_reviews.text: i plugged into a 4k tv but the adapter only picks up 1080p 60fps. anything higher than that it will stay at 30 fps. other than that it works flawlessly with sd cards, HDMI, USB C, and USB 3.0. I wish it had a VGA connection but that would make the product bulkier.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Ports quickly stopped working correctly
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for about 7 months, and many of the ports no longer work. The HDMI port is very fickle, and often produces a jittery, distorted image unless I find the exact right positioning. Two of the USB ports are suddenly no longer working, either. For $40, this product should work better.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: CONNECTOR DAMAGES HARD DRIVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one sometime ago but I rarely use it because I have other model of different brand as well, tried to use it and the toggle connector is loose!!! It just automatically disconnects from my computer which results to damaging my backup drive which is very expensive. I wonder if this item can still be returned???? If there is a ZERO STAR rating that will be my RATE!!! What a Waste of money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Annalie S. Saulog

customer_reviews.title: Ports failed; overheated
customer_reviews.text: Junk - don't buy; very cheaply made. Although it looks like it will serve all your needs, I found that after a few months, several of the ports failed. The hub also got quite hot to the touch, especially when using all the ports. Finally, my Mac started giving me warnings around peripherals shutting down due to not enough power. All of this began after the deadline for returns, so I am stuck with it. Despite the increased cost, I got the Apple USB-C to digital AV adapter and it works flawlessly. I can connect as many additional devices and hubs without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Cleomissy

customer_reviews.title: I bought one for my Dell XPS 9550 for work ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my Dell XPS 9550 for work, and it's performing very well. Bought a second one for use at home to have one of my desktop monitors available for an expanded high-resolution desktop. Devices I connect to it are responsive, and perform well for data transfers.
customer_reviews.author: ab80

customer_reviews.title: This product is not good, looks everything ok
customer_reviews.text: This product is not good, looks everything ok, Usb, SD card slot, HDMI, but just when I connect to my macbook, the wifi start to have problems, I though was my router or another thing, but I confirmed the problem was the USB-C HUB LETSCOM, just when I connect wifi make slow and always cannot connect just after disconnect the HUB, WIFI works OK again.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Navarro

customer_reviews.title: I continue to use it for the great value, but I just wished I didn't have ...
customer_reviews.text: A+ on the design and different options of ports. However, my WIFI is disrupted or doesn't even work when I use it. It doesn't happen ALL the time, but I would say 70% of the time I cannot use the internet when I have this plugged in. I continue to use it for the great value, but I just wished I didn't have to hope today was my lucky day and I'd be able to use WIFI.
customer_reviews.author: Uyen V.

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable and dangerous to hard drives.
customer_reviews.text: Bad connection. It would constantly disconnect my main hard drive. Very dangerous for hard drives especially when you have important data on it. It usually did not carry a power signal. It had trouble with multiple devices being used at the same time. Overall it was very poor in it's performance.
customer_reviews.author: Keaton

customer_reviews.title: A year later it's pretty much broken
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine originally. I have mainly used this adapter for the HDMI port to connect my MacBook Pro to the TV. About 3 months ago, the transferred image started having dots and distortion, blinking out once every few minutes. Now it does not work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita Li

customer_reviews.title: Works well though the USB-C cable could stand to be a little longer.
customer_reviews.text: Works well and the color matches my MacBook Pro. I wish the cable that connected to the Mac was a little longer so that it could accommodate the stand I have the machine on. Otherwise, it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: TwistyPro

customer_reviews.title: Pice of garbage, DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for about 3-3.5 months. And then, every time I plug it in, my MacBook looses WiFi. Out of interest, I tested it on 3 different MacBooks and it failed. Do not buy this junk
customer_reviews.author: Vitaly

customer_reviews.title: The speed of the SD card reader is pretty impressive, had no problem of getting it to ...
customer_reviews.text: The speed of the SD card reader is pretty impressive, had no problem of getting it to work with my 128GB SD card at all. The USB3 ports are also fine. Haven't tested the display ports yet but I didn't really need them cuz I already have HDMI on my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: but it works fine on the single USB2 port
customer_reviews.text: HDMI never worked properly (tested on multiple brands of TVs), SD card slots occasionally worked but refuse to work after about 4 months. I tried plugging a USB 3 card reader into the USB3 ports and it wont work, but it works fine on the single USB2 port. It also suffers from the semi-common Wifi interference problem - when it is plugged in, certain Wifi networks are not accessible
customer_reviews.author: Dan Watt

customer_reviews.title: Works seamlessly so far
customer_reviews.text: Works seamlessly so far. I've only had it for 3 days so I can't attest to durability. I'm feeding power to the laptop through this along with an external hard drive, keyboard, mouse, and hdmi to monitor. No issues at all. I needed it just to use all my usb devices on a new mac, but it has the added benefit of only plugging/unplugging one cord into the machine each time I come or go.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Very good at a fraction of the price of some other ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good at a fraction of the price of some other usb-c hubs. Using with macbook pro (2017, touchbar) and no issues to date. Small footprint for travel and appears to have good connectivity to peripherals.
customer_reviews.author: Bikenut999

customer_reviews.title: Product didn't feel solid from the beginning and now it's confirmed that it was too good to be true
customer_reviews.text: I waited to long to test every connection on this hub. The HDMI doesn't work at all. Product didn't feel solid from the beginning and now it's confirmed that it was too good to be true.
customer_reviews.author: JFP

customer_reviews.title: After almost a year, it still works
customer_reviews.text: Contains all the ports I need for my MacBook. Never had an issue with connection issues.
customer_reviews.author: YC

customer_reviews.title: Cant connect dongle without loosing internet
customer_reviews.text: Every time I connect the adapter to my laptop, the internet immediately stops working although I have full bars of service. I should have read the other reviews before buying this product. Do not buy unless you don't need wifi
customer_reviews.author: King kev

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING AFTER 2 MONTH'S (NOT CLICKBAIT FOR AMAZON)
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Youtuber. I bought this to transfer my videos and photo's, but it keeps disconnecting my Flash Drives, SD Cards, and Hard Disks from my MacBook Pro 2017. Used to work perfectly the first 2 months, now it keeps interfering with my work. The customer service didn't even bother to help out. On Amazon I can't return/exchange for a new one either! @Letscom, please help fix this...
customer_reviews.author: Ali Colak

customer_reviews.title: but this bad boy is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I was bummed I had to buy this with my new Mac, but this bad boy is awesome. It works great with no issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrible product! Do NOT buy it
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible product! Do NOT buy it. The USB connections don't all work and those that do work intermittently. A huge disappointment. Unfortunately I got rid of the box before I realized this. Otherwise I would return it.
customer_reviews.author: Boppo

customer_reviews.title: I love how many ports it has- buy this 1 adapter ...
customer_reviews.text: I love how many ports it has- buy this 1 adapter and have it work for almost everything! I use it to hook my Macbook Pro 2017 up to a projector, and have noticed that this adapter makes my laptop lose wifi connection VERY easily. Am unable to use it when I want to stream videos without buffering. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: HDMI connectivity makes the other ports stop working!
customer_reviews.text: This product maybe the worst electronic device I have ever bought. I have just tossed it on the corner of my office. When the HDMI is connected through this hub, the USB mice all slow down and they have a clear lag. I have asked multiple people to verify. The USB-3 connections don't work when the HDMI is connected. I just wanted to write this review and make sure everybody is aware of this functionality flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Sama

customer_reviews.title: Good Size, Very Light.
customer_reviews.text: Much lighter than I thought it would be, so far it works well but I've have it for less than a week.
customer_reviews.author: EstherTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Have been looking for an adapter for my Mac book pro with touchbar. I ordered this one because it had good customer feedback. It arrived very quickly. Tried it out, it works perfectly fine and the quality looks good. One thing to notice: it gets hot after a while but I think a lot of these products do!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon-Kunde M.P.

customer_reviews.title: It works and gives me all the needed ports in ...
customer_reviews.text: It works and gives me all the needed ports in this new laptop with 1 small USB that cannot even fit a mouse.
customer_reviews.author: PPo

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: It's very usefully to connect my mac to different devices. I bought this to connect my mac with my TV, it works very well. I can watch online stream on TV right now.
customer_reviews.author: Mengyuan Z.

customer_reviews.title: I like this grey color and It's awesome that it has ...
customer_reviews.text: Before i bought this product I have done some researches because my husband said he needed a USB C hub for his MacBook.I like this grey color and It's awesome that it has HIDM port to connect my TV.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: great techy product for a non-techy
customer_reviews.text: works great. very convenient when I have too many things to do with my macpro. excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: mhart

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: All connections work well, as advertised. A great value vs other products I saw for sale on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D.

customer_reviews.title: and is nearly perfect. I connected a USB SuperDrive today
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, and is nearly perfect. I connected a USB SuperDrive today, and it did not work - the error stated it wanted a USB port with power. Otherwise, the HDMI and all the other ports are perfect. This feels well built and is a good size.
customer_reviews.author: T. Raich

customer_reviews.title: Failed after eight weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: Well . . . it just quit on me. Didn't last eight weeks of use. It always seemed much too warm to the touch. But, in any event, it is dead. I'd suggest looking elsewhere for a dongle.
customer_reviews.author: Scott474

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't if I was you. I bought this for my macbook pro 2017 to connect to a monitor and external hard-drive. When I was backing up my macbook pro to my external hard-drive, this usb-c hub tends to lose connection therefore making it useless because my backups are always incomplete. Why waste money on something that doesn't work?
customer_reviews.author: birdisdaworrd

customer_reviews.title: Works well in the beginning, flaky 4 months in.
customer_reviews.text: Good in the beginning, but about 4 months in, the connection started getting flaky. Sometimes needs some wiggling to connect/reconnect. Were I able to do it again, I'd likely go with a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Klynstra

customer_reviews.title: but works great and gets pretty warm when you plug power in ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had ethernet port, my oversight, but works great and gets pretty warm when you plug power in through it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Powers

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with the quality and performance of this hub so ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the quality and performance of this hub so far. It is light and compact, its great to carry around without taking up too much space. I was looking for something more than just USB ports as well as an HDMI port, and this is perfect for traveling. I can charge multiple devices at once and utilize the HDMI at the same time. Performance is great on the USB and excellent on the card reader for my photos. thumbs up for this device!
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: HDMI does not work
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great thing to have if the HDMI port actually worked. Whenever I try to use it my internet either stops working or there is an error with displaying video. Honestly save yourself the money and get a hub without the HDMI port.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana F.

customer_reviews.title: A disappointment and waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I never use this because it doesn’t work. A disappointment and waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: No, thanks.
customer_reviews.text: I paid $60 for an adapter that lasted less than two years. I'm sorry but that's unacceptable. Wish it had a two year warranty to pay for a new one...
customer_reviews.author: Laurent De Prins

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine.. 5 months later went kapoot
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine.. 5 months later went kapoot. HDMI stopped working first, now whole thing is trash. Buy the good one (not this) first time around.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: ... actually smaller than I expected and lightweight which is good. User friendly the design is pretty too
customer_reviews.text: Its actually smaller than I expected and lightweight which is good. User friendly the design is pretty too. Totally satisfied with the product and the price

customer_reviews.title: New 2017MacBook Pro drops this connection all the time. ...
customer_reviews.text: New 2017MacBook Pro drops this connection all the time. Buy one from apple.

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the body material is poor. Bumpy edges and usb port plastic is not
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the body material is poor. Bumpy edges and usb port plastic is not straight
customer_reviews.author: Javid Kerimov

customer_reviews.title: I have barely used this hub because I use another ...
customer_reviews.text: I have barely used this hub because I use another one with ethernet port due to my work. Today that I wanted to connect my mac to my TV the hub didn’t worked. I tried with another adaptor and it worked. The adaptor was very expensive for the quality it showed.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: I can't say my expectations were met! it is ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't say my expectations were met ! it is an okay Hub. Transfer speed reduces significantly when it uses more than 2 USB drives at the same time. Also after a few minutes, it gets really hot. Besides that. it serves it purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Rudestan

customer_reviews.title: I've burned through two of these now, very flaky ...
customer_reviews.text: I've burned through two of these now, very flaky USB ports. It's as if they didn't design it to the USB size standard as have never had so much hassle trying to simply plug something in.

customer_reviews.title: Good, but I cannot access the SD and Microsd ...
customer_reviews.text: Good, but I cannot access the SD and Microsd at the same time, I am still working in how use it

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best by far of all the hubs I have tried for my 2016 MacBook Pro

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's starting to give me some problems, disconnects on its own, not sure why.

customer_reviews.title: This hub helps a lot when I am using my ...
customer_reviews.text: This hub helps a lot when I am using my Macbook. This is one of the must-have for the new Macbook users.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this cause of all the great reviews. After 30 days
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cause of all the great reviews. After 30 days, I started having a really big issue. Every time I connect the device to my MacBook my WIFI disconnects. This is really disappointing when you spend so much on a product.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Very sensitive, connection is very poor.
customer_reviews.text: Very sensitive connection that broke down after just a couple uses. Data transfer is spotty and often crashes because the connection breaks so often. External mouse doesn't even work well because the connection is so finicky.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few months. After about 6-8 ...
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a few months. After about 6-8 weeks the HDMI connection became very off and on, and would have to insert over and over, reconnect, etc. Finally last week it stopped working completely.

customer_reviews.title: POOR PRODUCT QUALITY I WISH I HAD NEVER BOUGHT IT
customer_reviews.text: POOR PRODUCT QUALITY I WISH I HAD NEVER BOUGHT IT. Poor product quality. The HDMI output is unstable. it only worked for couple of times and could not work anymore now. DO NOT BUY IT.

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic little hub with card reader for the MacBook
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic little hub with card reader for the MacBook. I use this with a 15" MacBook Pro (2007) and it works great! I've used both card readers as well as the USB ports (type A and type C) and everything I have connected to it has functioned perfectly. I've had everything from a USB mic/headset to an external HHD connected and never had any issues. I've been using it daily for quite some time now and would recommend this as an inexpensive alternative to the ones offered at the Apple store.
customer_reviews.author: J. Koons

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This device interferes with WiFi. It also stopped working after two months now I have to buy something else. It stopped reading memory cards and items in the hdmi port.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: SD Card Issue after about 3 months of use....
customer_reviews.text: After about 3 months, an issue with the SD Card reader presented it itself. In order to get the SD card to read, I have to hold the device in a certain way as to take up the "slack" in the USB C connection with my Macbook. It must be done in a certain geometry, otherwise it does not work. For a $50 device, this is pretty unacceptable after a short period of time.

customer_reviews.title: Good hub for the price.  Working well so far.
customer_reviews.text: Works well with my new Macbook Pro 2017. Haven't tried all of the ports, but it does connect and feed through multiple signals.

customer_reviews.title: SD Card Stopped Connecting
customer_reviews.text: This device was great a first. It had all the ports I could need and conveniently all on one dongle. I've had it for a few months and it slowly started to just randomly disconnect when I would be trying to upload photos from an SD card. At first it wasn't a big problem (just a slight inconvenience) as it would reconnect right back. Tonight, it won't even pick up my SD cards at all.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Great customer support

customer_reviews.title: Great hub, but check the power consumption of your devices.
customer_reviews.text: This hub works as advertised and designed and I really like I can connect 2 USB flash drives T the same time. However, it does not come with or accept a 120v power supply which limits the number of USB devices you can connect to appropriately 900mA.

product_meta.title: USB C Hub, Letscom 7 Ports Type C Hub with USBC Charging Port, HDMI Port, 3 USB 3.0 Ports, SD & MicroSD Card Reader, Portable for MacBook Pro, Chromebook Pixel and More Type-C Devices (Grey)
feature_bullets: 7-in-1 USB-C Hub: Expands computer ports into an HDMI output port, a USB-C charging port, 3 USB 3.0 ports, and a SD and TF card reader
4K HDMI Video Output: Delivers high-definition audio and video; up to 4K (3840x2160@30Hz) resolution and you never worry about blur, distortion and delay
Super Speed USB 3.0 Port: Enjoy data transfer speeds of up to 5 Gbps; can transfer an HD movie in seconds
Power Delivery and Data Transfer: Charge your laptop while connecting all supportable peripherals to transfer data
Slim & Compact: Fits easily in bags and purses, allowing you to expand your computers’ capabilities while on-the-go; sleek aluminum design perfectly complements Apple accessories

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.0 out of 5 stars114 ratings3.0 out of 5 stars
